name: gpg-bridge-monorepo
description: GPG Bridge - Three extension pack for relaying GPG to Windows from remotes

scripts.compile: npm run compile:shared && npm run compile:agent && npm run compile:request
scripts.postinstall: npm run postinstall:shared && npm run postinstall:agent && npm run postinstall:request
scripts.watch: npm run watch:shared & npm run watch:agent & npm run watch:request
scripts.package: npm run package:agent && npm run package:request && npm run package:pack
scripts.test: npm run test:shared && npm run test:agent && npm run test:request
scripts.test:integration: cd gpg-bridge-agent && npm run test:integration && cd ../gpg-bridge-request && npm run test:integration
